title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand the issue mentioned in Bug 8142. It seems to be related to a lack of scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, but there are no details provided about the observed behavior, expected behavior, or steps to reproduce. I will need additional information to investigate and address this bug.
SR: Please provide more details about the observed behavior, expected behavior, and steps to reproduce the issue on binary projects. Include any relevant error messages or screenshots if applicable.
